linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
